svt_i2c_slave_random_sequence Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_i2c_slave_random_sequence:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This sequence configure Slave to send NACK for address, with User define nack_addr_count, which shows how many times slave will send NACK for it's address.

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Declares its local attributes

  • Receives the values of attributes of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes randomized value.

  • Assigns received value of class attributes to its local attributes

  • Execute sequence to configure Slave for NACK for a particular data byte
